forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. Southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere carries a gentle chill with a delicate moisture lingering in the air, hinting at the possibility of a light drizzle. The clouds hang overhead, softly diffusing the early light, creating a serene tableau that invites quiet contemplation. With temperatures hovering around the mild 55 degrees, the city's iconic hills and landmarks, such as the Golden Gate Bridge, may be shrouded in a veil of mist, reminding onlookers of the ever-present marine layer that graces our coastal haven.

Looking ahead to the day, the clouds are expected to part, yielding to moments of sunshine that will illuminate the streets and offer a glimpse of warmth, with temperatures climbing toward a comfortable 64 degrees. A mild southwest breeze, persistent yet unobtrusive, will rustle the vibrant greenery, creating a gentle soundtrack that complements the city's rhythmic pulse. As the hours pass, this evolving canvas invites wanderers to venture into the neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a quaint café experience in the Mission District. Dress in layers; a light jacket will serve you well in the cooler intervals while allowing for ease as the sunlight breaks through. Today holds the promise of a moderate yet pleasant urban adventure, where the charm of San Francisco becomes ever more palpable under the shifting skies.
